category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA123_relation_navigation_default_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to configure default behavior for the expansion of TCAA relationships. Possible values: 0 - expand TCAA relations as precise links and use the specific revision of linked object (Default) 1 - apply the current revision rule to identify the proper item revision for the linked object 2 - retrieve the most recent revision available for the linked object
